summary: During the Irish Civil War in 1922, a family earns a big inheritance. They start leading a rich life, forgetting what the most important values are.
cast: Barry Fitzgerald|Maire O'Neill|Edward Chapman|Sidney Morgan|Sara Allgood|John Laurie|Dave Morris|Kathleen O'Regan|John Longden|Dennis Wyndham|Fred Schwartz|Donald Calthrop|George Spence
title: Juno and the Paycock
